titleStmt.title: An abridgement of Christian doctrine: with proofs of Scripture for points controverted. : Catechistically explained by way of question and answer.
titleStmt.author: Turberville, Henry, d. 1678.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages tightly bound and stained, with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
